text: Stagecoach London is a large bus company in Greater London. It is a child company of Stagecoach and manages routes under contract to Transport for London mostly in East and South East London as well as some bus journeys in Central London. It is the largest subsidiary of Stagecoach group with 314.5 million passengers journeys in 2015-16 and a fleet of almost 1300 buses. Category:1994 establishments in England Category:London bus operators
title: Stagecoach London
